div.class: col-md-4 aboutMe aboutStory wow fadeInUp animated

p.span: I am a Full Stack Developer Trainee. I am focused on developing myself to work agile and to meet the needs of my Organization. I like to work as a team and to bring the positive influence to my team.

div.class: col-md-4 aboutMe aboutStory wow fadeInUp animated
col-md-4 aboutMe aboutProfile wow fadeInUp animated
col-md-4 aboutMe aboutInfo wow fadeInUp animated

span.class: lnr lnr-briefcase wow bounceIn animated animated

li.p: Benseron solutions offer inspired features such as full redundancy, business intelligence dashboards, performance dashboards, mobile options, franchise ready equipment, PCI compliant software, check status options, integrated credit card processors, and cross-platform capability.

It is a Software publishing, consultancy and supply [Software publishing includes production, supply and documentation of ready-made (non-customized) software, operating systems software, business and other applications software, Consultancy includes providing the best solution in the form of custom software after analyzing the user?s needs and problems. Custom software also includes made-to-order software based on orders from specific users. Also, included are writing of software of any kind following directives of the users; software maintenance, web-page design.

span.class: lnr lnr-spell-check wow bounceIn animated animated

li.h4: Computer Science and Engineering @ Kingston Engineering College,Vellore.
li.p: Kingston Engineering College, located in the sprawling campus of 120 acres, in Vellore City, Chittoor National Highway and affiliated to Anna University, Chennai.The mission of the institute is to render an ambience for the teaching- learning process and research that conforms to the finest standard of world class technical education for which Kingston Engineering College inherits a strong establishment of infrastructure and management as a part of attaining the intended objective.

li.h4: Secondary and Higher Secondary School @St.Joseph's Higher Secondary School,Cuddalore.
li.p: St. Joseph's Higher Secondary School is one of the oldest and well-established schools of India located in Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu. The school is also known for large campus and large pupil/student strength(more than 10000).St. Joseph's High School which was started in 1868. This school was elevated into a college in 1884 through the efforts of Father Tarbes and was affiliated to the University of Madras. The School bears the Motto Labor omnia vincit, meaning "Hard work conquers all".
